# sakura_enhanced_db (Data Source)

Get information about an existing EnhancedDB.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "sakura_enhanced_db" "foobar" {
  name = "foobar"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the EnhancedDB.
- `name` (String) The name of the EnhancedDB.
- `tags` (Set of String) The tags of the EnhancedDB.

### Read-Only

- `allowed_networks` (List of String) A list of CIDR blocks allowed to connect
- `database_name` (String) The name of database
- `database_type` (String) The type of database
- `description` (String) The description of the EnhancedDB.
- `hostname` (String) The name of database host. This will be built from `database_name` + `tidb-is1.db.sakurausercontent.com`
- `icon_id` (String) The icon id attached to the EnhancedDB
- `max_connections` (Number) The value of max connections setting
- `region` (String) The region name
